project_plan.name: Basic Data Analysis on CSV File
project_plan.description: Create a Python program that performs basic data analysis by calculating and displaying the mean, median, and mode for numerical columns specified by the user from a CSV file.

task.name: Set up the environment and import necessary libraries (e.g., pandas, numpy, statistics).
Implement functionality to read a CSV file and load its data.
Implement the calculation of mean for specified numerical columns.
Implement the calculation of median for specified numerical columns.
Implement the calculation of mode for specified numerical columns.
Implement user input functionality to specify which columns to analyze.
Write tests for all the implemented analysis features.
Execute tests on all implemented features to ensure that they function correctly.
